qas.question: What angel, according to Muslim tradition, ordered Muhammad to order a siege on the Banu Qurayza?
Who claims Muhammad had a treaty with the Banu Qurayza that was torn apart?
How many members of the Banu Qurayza were beheaded after surrendering to Muhammad and his followers according to Tabari and Ibn Hisham?
According to Sunni Hadith which members of the Banu Qurayza were beheaded after surrendering to Muhammad and his followers?
How many Muslims were killed during the invasion of Banu Qurayza?

context: Muhammad also ordered another siege on the Banu Qurayza during the Invasion of Banu Qurayza, because according to Muslim tradition he had been ordered to do so by the angel <a0_0>Gabriel<a0_0/>. <a1_0>Al-Waqidi<a1_0/> claims Muhammad had a treaty with the tribe which was torn apart. Stillman and Watt deny the authenticity of al-Waqidi. Al-Waqidi has been frequently criticized by Muslim writers, who claim that he is unreliable. <a2_0>600-900<a2_0/> members of the Banu Qurayza were beheaded after they surrendered (according to Tabari and Ibn Hisham). Another source says <a3_0>all Males and 1 woman<a3_0/> beheaded (according to Sunni Hadith). <a4_0>Two<a4_0/> Muslims were killed
